detailed_findings.steps_to_reproduce: Check if requirements.txt exists in project root
Set environment variables: {'ENVIRONMENT': 'production', 'JWT_SECRET_KEY': 'test-key-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx'} and load Settings()
detailed_findings.observed_output:
Exception: 1 validation error for Settings
  Value error, Production configuration validation failed:
- JWT_SECRET_KEY must be at least 64 characters in production
- CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS must be configured in production
- ALLOWED_HOSTS must be configured in production [type=value_error, input_value={'ENVIRONMENT': 'producti...neondb?sslmode=require'}, input_type=dict]
    For further information visit https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.11/v/value_error
